1.「あ…… あなたは……！？| まさか 地上の民なのですか……？: Ah...! Are you...! Don't tell me you are a|citizen of the earth...?

2.「そんな……私を救おうなど 考えないで！| この魔物は 危険です！| 来てはいけ: Don't even think about... Don't even think|about saving me! This demon is dangerous!|You can't come here...!

3.「ああ…… どうして……。 | 私は 囚われの身のままで よかったのに。| 身を: Oh... What do you say? I'll stay a prisoner.|I'm not going to put myself in danger.

4.「私は あなたに | 救ってもらえるような者では ありません。| 海底の国を滅ぼ: I am not the kind of person you can save. I|am the one who destroyed the underwater|world.

5.「そうですね……。| あなたには すべて お話しするとしましょう。: Yes, I will tell you all about it. I will|tell you all about it.

6.「……ある晩 ちいさなイカが| この神殿に 現れました。| とても遠方から やっ: ... One night a little squid appeared in|this temple. He seemed to have come from|very far away.

7.「海底の民と よく似ているけれど違う…… | はじめて見る イカという生き物を前:
Similar to, but different from, the people|at the bottom of the sea... We remember|being very puzzled when we saw the squid|
|creature for the first time.

8.「……彼女は 悲しい瞳で 私に言いました。| 私は たった ひとりきりのイカだ。: ... She says to me with sad eyes. I am the|only one. I want a family for myself.

9.「私は その望みをかなえるべく 彼女の分身を | 創りました。私は 望むままに物:
I created her alter ego to fulfill her|desire. I have a piece of the power of|creation in my hand to create things as I|
|wish.

10.「……しかし 今にして思えば| 身に余るチカラだったのでしょう……。: ... But in retrospect, it was probably more|than he could remember.

11.「彼女の分身は 私の想定を超えて | みずからの分身を 生み出すチカラを| 持っ: Her alter ego has the power to create her|own beyond my expectations.

12.「ひたすらに増殖した 分身たちは心を持たず| あたりを破壊し…… 瞬く間に……|:
The ever-growing alter egos, mindless,|destroying everything in their path... In|the blink of an eye... That beautiful... The|
|undersea country was destroyed.

13.「……私は 間違えていました。 | 異なる姿の者でも 家族として国に迎えてやれば: ... I made a mistake. It would have been|better if we had welcomed them as family,|even if they looked different.

14.「本当に必要なのは | 創生のチカラなどでは なかった……。: What is really needed is not the power of|creation.

16.「けれど…… そうですね。| このような愚かな私を救ってくれた あなたや| 海底: But... Yes. I will repay your heart and the|hearts of the people under the sea for|saving me from such foolishness.

17.「この身が いつまで持つかは わかりませんが| これからは できるかぎり| 神殿: I don't know how long my body will last, but|from now on I will try to purify the temple|as much as I can.

18.「ありがとう 地上の民よ。| これは 私たちの仲間の印。| どうか あなたに受け: Thank you ground. This is between us. Please|accept it for you.

20.「せめて 私のチカラが 生み出す装備たちが| この時代を生きる あなたがたに|: I hope that the equipment that my power will|produce will be of some use to you who live|in this age.

21.偽物のアンルシアを使った ピュージュの|策略で キュロノスを倒した際 手に入れた:
Puju's trick of using a fake Anlusia to|defeat Culonos took away the seed of the War|Peril, which he had obtained. Pursuing Puju,|
|they headed for Gamilgo's Shield Island,|where they were attacked by a group of|Pujes. Although he was victorious, the|
|ritual using the Seeds of War was completed,|and the gate to the demon world was opened.

24.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと|バルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い|彼ら:
To meet with the Demon King Asbal in Zecres|Magical Kingdom and the Demon King Valeria|in Valdista Fortress, and to make a promise|
|to gather at the Grand Gate to help solve|their problems. When they arrive in the sand|city of Farazard, they discover that Yushka|
|is the Demon King of Farazard. He|accompanies Yushka on her quest to become|the Demon King, and heads back to the Grand|
|Gate of Inquisition.

25.３人の魔王が 一堂に会し 大審門が開く。|デモンマウンテン山頂への道には 大魔王:
The three Demon Kings meet at the Grand|Gate. On the road to the summit of Demon|Mountain, there was an obstacle to test the|
|qualities of the Great Demon King. At the|top of the mountain, where Yushkaa|Asbalvarella and the others overcome the|
|ordeal and reach the summit, there is a|paradise-like garden of Jadin, where they|finally come face to face with the Demon|
|Lord.

27.「わしは 待っておった。| そなたのような若者が 現れることを。: Welcome hero. I have been waiting a long|time for one such as thee.

28.「もし わしの味方になれば| アストルティアの半分を お前に やろう。: I give thee a chance to rule this world and|share half of Astoltia with me.

29.「どうじゃ？| わしの味方に なるか？<yesno><close>: What sayest thou? Will thou join me?<yesno><close>

30.「……そうか。| 味方になると 約束するのだな。: Good. Thou hast made a wise decision.

31.「しかし…… アストルティアは| まだ わしのものではない。: But, Astoltia still belongs to thine rule of|my own.

32.「ここで そなたを 死霊の騎士にならしめ| わが先兵として アストルティア征服の: Thou shall now be thine Knight of the Dead!|Serve thine will for all eternity as my|guard to conquer Astoltia!

34.「どうした？| 世界の半分を ほしくはないのか？| 悪い話では あるまい。<ye: Thine hesitant to rule half the world with|me? Thou thinkest it is beneficial to thy|quest.<yesno><close>

37.道化師ピュージュを追って たどり着いた|ガミルゴの盾島で 瀕死の重傷を負い|目が:
He was mortally wounded on Gamilgo's Shield|Island, following the clown Puju, and woke|up to find himself in a demon's world. A|
|blood contract with Yushka, a traveler of|the demon tribe, changed his appearance into|that of a demon. In order to return to his|
|original form, he travels with Yushuka to|the three demon kingdoms of the demon world|to meet the Lord of the Demon Immortals at|
|the end of the Great Gate.

38.ゼクレス魔導国で 魔王アスバルと|バルディスタ要塞で 魔王ヴァレリアと会い|砂の:
He met the Demon King Asbal in the Zecres|Magical Kingdom and the Demon King Valeria|in the Valdista Fortress, and discovered|
|that Yushka was also one of the Demon Kings|in the Sand City of Farazard. After climbing|Demon Mountain with the three Demon Kings|
|and meeting with the Lord of Magic, Yushka|was named as the most suitable candidate to|become the next Great Demon King.

40.ゴーラの事件の解決直後 ヴァレリアが現れ|魔瘴の巫女イルーシャを連れ去ろうとする:
Valeria appears and attempts to take away|the miasma priestess Irusha, but Yushka, who|was hiding among the soldiers, intervenes,|
|and the priestess is taken away by Farazard.|Valeria, angered, decides to start a war,|and the Valdistas invade the Jarimbach|
|Desert.

41.魔仙卿の指示で向かった 旧ネクロデア領で|ユシュカの副官 ナジーンと再会し|彼の:
In the former Necrodea territory, where he|was headed under the direction of the Lord|of Magic, he is reunited with Yushka's|
|second-in-command, Nazian, who guides him|into Farazard. Yushka's kidnapping of Ilusha|is revealed to have been a ploy by Yushka to|
|provoke Valdista, and a war between the|three countries, including the Zechresian|mage kingdom, finally breaks out.

42.王太后エルガドーラの操る ミアラの宝杖で|太古の魔人と化した アスバルが放つ光線:
The Dowager Empress Elgadora's treasured|staff of Meara transformed Asbal into an|ancient demon and the rays of light he|
|unleashed burned the battlefield, killing|Yushka, and leaving her to die. Nadine, who|protected Yushka from the rays, lost her|
|life. Valdista was also defeated, and the|war seemed to end with the victory of|Zekres. However, Lord Mazen, who considers|
|demons to be dangerous, requests that the|treasured staff of Miara be destroyed.

43.バルディスタは ゼクレスへの復讐戦を挑み|戦いは 次の舞台へ。ゼクレス城の中庭で:
Valdista challenges Zecres to a revenge|battle. The battle follows. In the courtyard|of Zechres' castle, Valeria was hit by a|
|demon's ray. With the help of Yushka, who|rushed to her predicament, the ancient|demons were defeated, and the war of the|
|demon worlds came to an end in the form of|the division of the three kingdoms. Valeria|heads to the Temple of Goda in the Garden of|
|Jadin to receive a new mission.

45.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた |デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|:
When he touches the statue of the source of|darkness, the statue shatters and a|mysterious girl named Irusha emerges from|
|inside. The countries of the Demon World are|plotting over the ability of Ilusha to|control the miasma, in anticipation of the|
|great miasma season that will soon be upon|us. A war begins, called the Demon World|War.

47.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する|ゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。|:
At the request of Lord Mazen, he rescues|Zecres Valdista, which is struggling to|recover after the war. In the land of|
|Zekres, he strikes a plot against the Grand|Duke of Ojalos, who is plotting to usurp the|throne of the kingdom. Asbal, the Demon|
|King, decides to lead his country by killing|his mother, who has been turned into a|monster and a bomb, with his own hands.

48.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が|暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる|ベ:
At the request of Bertolo, who believes|Valeria is still alive, he searches for her.|Valeria, who had been transformed into Tilia|
|by the curse of the Fountain, is restored to|her former state. When he returns to the|Temple of Goda after rescuing both|
|countries, Yushka appears and convinces him|that you must become the new Great Demon|King.

49.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると|魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため|:
When Yushka's proposal was still undecided,|Lord Masen reveals his true identity and|promises to become the Great Demon King to|
|protect the world. Aspar and Valeria agree|to accept his position, and the coronation|ceremony will be held at the Demon King's|
|castle, which Yushka has graciously given to|him.

50.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を|呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は|アス:
At the coronation ceremony, the demon Lord|summoned a monster of miasma souls to attack|the attendees. The demon world is a place|
|cut off from Astoltia, and the demon lord|disappears. The chamberlain Karlow has|something to say. Go to the throne room of|
|the Great Demon King's castle.

52.デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|魔瘴をあやつる少女 イルーシャとも|出:
At the summit of Demon Mountain, he meets|the Lord of Demon Mountain and Ilusha, a|girl who controls a miasma. After returning|
|from her demon form, a quarrel over her|ability triggered a war involving the three|nations of the demon world. After a fierce|
|battle, each of the three countries suffered|tremendous damage and the war of the demon|world came to an end.

54.新たな大魔王の強さを 魔界の民に示すため|反乱の芽を 自ら 潰すことになる。|潜:
To show the people of the demon world the|strength of the new Great Demon Lord, he|himself crushes the seeds of rebellion. In|
|the rebel hideout he infiltrated, he met a|young human named Narazia, who resembled|Irusha, and rescued him from captivity. As|
|the Demon Lord's fame steadily grows, an|incident occurs at the Zahadigarh Rocks|where a large amount of miasma (a noxious|
|gas) erupts, and the Demon Lord is forced to|take action.

56.ジャディンの園で 魔瘴があふれ出したとの|報告が入り アンルシア イルーシャ|ユ:
Reports of a noxious gas overflowing in the|Garden of Jadin, Anrutia Irusha heads there|with Yushka. In the depths of Demon|
|Mountain, there is a great cavern, and the|Temple of Jagonuba rises above it. Deep|within the temple is the Lord of the Demons,|
|the God of Perdition... They try to suppress|Jagonuba, but their attempts fail and they|are swallowed up by the miasma.

57.半覚醒のジャゴヌバは ただのひと息で |勇者を 魔王を 大魔王を 圧倒する。|か:
The half-awakened Jagonuba, with a mere|breath, overwhelmed the heroes, the Demon|King, and the Great Demon King. Barely|
|holding it back was Yushka's master...|Marine the Wise. Leaving Marlene alone in|the temple, the group was forced to return|
|to the Great Demon King's castle. Narazia,|who had fainted, woke up and went to the|infirmary in the east wing of the Great|
|Demon King's castle.

59.次の大魔王を決めるため おもむいた |デモンマウンテンの山頂で 魔仙卿と対面し|:
When he touches the statue of the source of|darkness, the statue shatters and a|mysterious girl named Irusha emerges from|
|inside. The countries of the Demon World are|plotting over the ability of Ilusha to|control the miasma, in anticipation of the|
|great miasma season that will soon be upon|us. A war begins, called the Demon World|War.

61.魔仙卿の依頼で 戦後の復興に苦戦する|ゼクレス バルディスタを救済することに。|:
At the request of Lord Mazen, he rescues|Zecres Valdista, which is struggling to|recover after the war. In the land of|
|Zekres, he strikes a plot against the Grand|Duke of Ojalos, who is plotting to usurp the|throne of the kingdom. Asbal, the Demon|
|King, decides to lead his country by killing|his mother, who has been turned into a|monster and a bomb, with his own hands.

62.バルディスタ要塞では 玉座を狙う賊徒が|暴れており ヴァレリアの生存を信じる|ベ:
At the request of Bertolo, who believes|Valeria is still alive, he searches for her.|Valeria, who had been transformed into Tilia|
|by the curse of the Fountain, is restored to|her former state. When he returns to the|Temple of Goda after rescuing both|
|countries, Yushka appears and convinces him|that you must become the new Great Demon|King.

63.ユシュカの提案に乗るか 決めかねていると|魔仙卿が正体を明かし 世界を守るため|:
When Yushka's proposal was still undecided,|Lord Masen reveals his true identity and|promises to become the Great Demon King to|
|protect the world. Aspar and Valeria agree|to accept his position, and the coronation|ceremony will be held at the Demon King's|
|castle, which Yushka has graciously given to|him.

64.戴冠式の場で 魔仙卿は 魔瘴魂の怪物を|呼び寄せ 参列者を襲わせる。魔界は|アス:
At the coronation ceremony, the demon Lord|summoned a monster of miasma souls to attack|the attendees. The demon world is a place|
|cut off from Astoltia, and the demon lord|disappears. The chamberlain Karlow has|something to say. Go to the throne room of|
|the Great Demon King's castle.

65.ガミルゴの盾島の戦いで 瀕死の重傷を負い|魔族の旅人ユシュカに 連れ去られた魔界:
He was mortally wounded in the battle of|Gamilgo's Shield Island and was taken away|by the demon traveler Yushka. In the city of|
|Farazard, Yushka is also found to be a Demon|King. At the Demon Mountain, where the three|Demon Kings gathered, he met the Elder Demon|
|Lord of the Demon World, Ilusha, a priestess|of miasma.

67.新たな大魔王として 魔界各地で活動する中|イルーシャと瓜二つの ナラジアと出会う:
The new Great Demon King is active in|various parts of the Demon World, and he|meets Narazia, who is the exact duplicate of|
|Irusha. The two are reconciled with the|brave princess Anlusia, who has come to the|Demon World to defeat the Great Demon King,|
|and go to the Garden of Jadin, where the|miasma is overflowing.

68.ユシュカの師匠 賢者マリーンの助言により|ジャゴヌバに対抗する 唯一の手段として:
On the advice of Yushka's mentor, the sage|Marlene, he revives the goddess of creation,|Luthiana, as the only means of opposing|
|Jagonuba. In Finetka, the Land of Light, it|is revealed that Irusha is the goddess's|consort. He tells her that the way to revive|
|the goddess is to visit the shrines of the|goddesses throughout Astoltia with Irusha,|who is a surrogate of the goddess from the|
|Six Sacred Formations.

69.祠巡りをしていく中 女神を復活させると|イルーシャが 消滅してしまうこと……|イ:
As he visits the shrines, he learns that if|he revives the goddess, Irusha will be|extinguished. The twin of Ilusha, Narazia,|
|was found to be a dependent of Jagonuba, and|her will had taken over Ilusha's life. After|manifesting the will of the goddess, Ilusha|
|leaves with Narazia and her minions, the|evil gods of Puju and the Forbidden|Goddesses, and the two of them return to the|
|world of the gods.

70.イルーシャを追って 女神復活のための|儀式が行われる ルファ神殿へ行くことに。|:
She follows Irusha to the temple of Rufa,|where the ritual for the goddess's|resurrection is held. At the top of the|
|temple, she battles Puju, the evil goddess|of taunts, and defeats her with the help of|Marlene, who rushes to her aid.

71.女神の復活と時を同じくして ジャゴヌバも|また 完全覚醒し 二柱の大神による|世:
The battle for the fate of the world between|the two great deities unfolds as Jagoneva is|also fully awakened at the same time as the|
|resurrection of the goddess. The world is|thrown into despair as the goddess is|defeated by a blow from Jagoneva, who has|
|absorbed the evil gods defeated by Lutyana|and raised their abilities. I have something|to say to you from Kahlow, the chamberlain.|
|Go to the throne room of the Great Demon|King's castle.
